channel.title: Covid on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Covid on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Year End Round Up
item.description: More of the same, everything still up in the air due to covid. Travel very limited so we have stayed local since our return in July/August.

item.title: Marking Time
item.description: Just doing as many jobs as possible, but the weather is awful and since Lotti got the ok from the vet we have decided to return to Spain if possible.

item.title: Resuming Normality
item.description: Today Valencia moved into phase 2 which allowed large stores to open with certain restrictions, and bars and restaurants to open with reduced capacity. Exercise is allowed without restriction finally we are getting back to some normality.

item.title: Slowly Getting Back to Normal
item.description: This is the first week since lock down began that we can legitimately leave the house for exercise, so we have managed a couple of walks and some MTB rides

item.title: April a Lost Month
item.description: Garth and Helena having left on the 17th March and arrived safely back in Canada, now face 14 days self quarantine, very disappointing to miss out on their company. This has left Flo and I not quite knowing what to do, or what the coming days will bring.
